com.microsoft.azure.v2.management.network

Interface VirtualNetworkGatewayConnection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GroupableResource<com.microsoft.azure.v2.management.network.implementation.NetworkManager,com.microsoft.azure.v2.management.network.implementation.VirtualNetworkGatewayConnectionInner>, HasId, HasInner<com.microsoft.azure.v2.management.network.implementation.VirtualNetworkGatewayConnectionInner>, HasManager<com.microsoft.azure.v2.management.network.implementation.NetworkManager>, HasName, HasParent<VirtualNetworkGateway>, HasResourceGroup, IndependentChild<com.microsoft.azure.v2.management.network.implementation.NetworkManager>, IndependentChildResource<com.microsoft.azure.v2.management.network.implementation.NetworkManager,com.microsoft.azure.v2.management.network.implementation.VirtualNetworkGatewayConnectionInner>, Indexable, Refreshable<VirtualNetworkGatewayConnection>, Resource, Updatable<VirtualNetworkGatewayConnection.Update>, UpdatableWithTags<VirtualNetworkGatewayConnection>

    @Beta(since="V1_3_0")
public interface VirtualNetworkGatewayConnection
extends IndependentChildResource<com.microsoft.azure.v2.management.network.implementation.NetworkManager,com.microsoft.azure.v2.management.network.implementation.VirtualNetworkGatewayConnectionInner>, Refreshable<VirtualNetworkGatewayConnection>, Updatable<VirtualNetworkGatewayConnection.Update>, UpdatableWithTags<VirtualNetworkGatewayConnection>, HasParent<VirtualNetworkGateway>
    Client-side representation of Virtual Network Gateway Connection object, associated with Virtual Network Gateway.
